1.name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
1.description: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

2.name: Once Upon a Time in the West
2.description: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

3.name: Barbarella
3.description: Barbarella, an astronaut from the 41st century, sets out to find and stop the evil scientist Durand Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.

4.name: Rosemary's Baby
4.description: A young couple moves in to an apartment only to be surrounded by peculiar neighbors and occurrences. When the wife becomes mysteriously pregnant, paranoia over the safety of her unborn child begins to control her life.

5.name: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
5.description: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

6.name: Romeo and Juliet
6.description: When two young members of feuding families meet, forbidden love ensues.

7.name: The Wrecking Crew
7.description: Gold bullion worth USD 1 billion has been stolen from a hijacked train in Denmark. The main suspect is Count Massimo Contini. The US government sends Matt Helm, one of its top agents, to investigate and recover the gold.

8.name: Planet of the Apes
8.description: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a planet in the distant future where intelligent talking apes are the dominant species, and humans are the oppressed and enslaved.

9.name: Night of the Living Dead
9.description: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a bloodthirsty, flesh-eating breed of monsters who are ravaging the East Coast of the United States.

10.name: Rachel, Rachel
10.description: Rachel is a 35 year old school teacher who has no man in her life and lives with her mother. When a man from the big city returns and asks her out, she begins to have to make decisions about her life and where she wants it to go.

11.name: Where Eagles Dare
11.description: Allied Agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding American Brigadier General George Carnaby (Robert Beatty) prisoner, but that's not all that's really going on.

12.name: Journey to Shiloh
12.description: At the beginning of the Civil War, seven friends embark on a cross-country journey in order to join the Confederate army.

13.name: Bullitt
13.description: An all guts, no glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.

14.name: Funny Girl
14.description: The life of Fanny Brice, famed comedienne and entertainer of the early 1900s. We see her rise to fame as a Ziegfeld girl, subsequent career, and her personal life, particularly her relationship with Nick Arnstein.

15.name: The Thomas Crown Affair
15.description: A debonair, adventuresome bank executive believes he has pulled off the perfect multi-million dollar heist, only to match wits with a sexy insurance investigator who will do anything to get her man.

16.name: Oliver!
16.description: After being sold to a mortician, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor.

17.name: The Lion in Winter
17.description: 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. They and his wife variously plot to force him.

18.name: The Subject Was Roses
18.description: A young man returning home from World War II finds himself caught up in his parents' turbulent relationship.

19.name: The Love Bug
19.description: A race car driver becomes a champion with a Volkswagen Beetle with a mind of its own.

20.name: Hang 'Em High
20.description: When an innocent man barely survives a lynching, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the vigilantes to justice.

21.name: The Swimmer
21.description: A man spends a summer day swimming as many pools as he can all over a quiet suburban town.

22.name: Mad Doctor of Blood Island
22.description: A man who loves to travel, travels to an island where a mad doctor is creating zombies.

23.name: The Party
23.description: A clerical mistake results in a bumbling Indian film star being invited to an exclusive Hollywood party instead of being fired.

24.name: Coogan's Bluff
24.description: Arizona Deputy Sheriff Coogan (Clint Eastwood) is sent to New York City to escort an escaped fugitive back for trial.

25.name: Candy
25.description: Candy Christian, an innocent high-schooler, encounters numerous colorful characters and humorous sexual situations while attempting to find meaning in life.

26.name: The Odd Couple
26.description: Two friends try sharing an apartment, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.

27.name: The Brotherhood
27.description: The son of a powerful Mafia don comes home from his army service in Vietnam and wants to lead his own life, but family tradition, intrigues and powerplays involving his older brother ...                See full summary »

28.name: The Boston Strangler
28.description: A series of brutal murders in Boston sparks a seemingly endless and increasingly complex manhunt.

29.name: Yours, Mine and Ours
29.description: A widower with ten children falls for a widow with eight, and they must decide about forming a huge, unconventional family.

30.name: Bandolero!
30.description: Mace Bishop masquerades as a hangman in order to save his outlaw brother from the gallows, runs to Mexico chased by the Sheriff's posse and fights against Mexican bandits.

31.name: Teorema
31.description: A mysterious young man seduces each member of a bourgeois family. When he suddenly leaves, how will their lives change?

32.name: Vixen!
32.description: Vixen lives in a Canadian mountain resort with her naive pilot husband. While he's away flying in tourists, she gets it on with practically everybody including a husband and his wife, and ...                See full summary »

33.name: Hellfighters
33.description: The story of macho oil well firefighters and their wives.

34.name: If....
34.description: In this allegorical story, a revolution led by pupil Mick Travis takes place at an old established private school in England.

35.name: The Devil Rides Out
35.description: Devil worshipers plan to convert two new victims.

36.name: The Devil's Brigade
36.description: A US Army Colonel is tasked with forming an elite commando-style unit from crack Canadian troops and the dregs of the US Army.

37.name: Histoires extraordinaires
37.description: Anthology film from three European directors based on stories by Edgar Allan Poe: a cruel princess haunted by a ghostly horse, a sadistic young man haunted by his double, and an alcoholic actor haunted by the Devil.

38.name: Il grande silenzio
38.description: A mute gunfighter defends a young widow and a group of outlaws against a gang of bounty killers in the winter of 1898, and a grim, tense struggle unfolds.

39.name: Witchfinder General
39.description: A young soldier seeks to put an end to the evils caused by a vicious witch-hunter when the latter terrorizes his fiancée and kills her uncle.

40.name: Vargtimmen
40.description: While vacationing on a remote Scandanavian island with his younger pregnant wife, an artist has an emotional breakdown while confronting his repressed desires.

41.name: Yellow Submarine
41.description: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred (Lance Percival) in his Yellow Submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music hating Blue Meanies.

42.name: Head
42.description: The Monkees are tossed about in a psychedelic, surrealist, plotless, circular bit of fun fluff.

43.name: The Green Berets
43.description: Col. Mike Kirby picks two teams of crack Green Berets for a mission in South Vietnam. First off is to build and control a camp that is trying to be taken by the enemy the second mission is to kidnap a North Vietnamese General.

44.name: The Girl on a Motorcycle
44.description: A married woman leaves her husband and zooms off on her motorcycle to see her lover.

45.name: Charly
45.description: An intellectually disabled man undergoes an experiment that gives him the intelligence of a genius.

46.name: Ice Station Zebra
46.description: USN nuclear sub USS Tigerfish must rush to the North Pole to rescue the staff of Drift Ice Station Zebra weather station.

47.name: Secret Ceremony
47.description: A penniless woman meets a strange girl who insists she is her long-lost mother, and becomes enmeshed in a web of deception, and perhaps madness, in this powerful psychological thriller.

48.name: Faces
48.description: A middle-aged man leaves his wife for a younger woman. Shortly after, his ex-wife also begins a relationship with a younger partner. The film follows their struggles to find love amongst each other.

49.name: La mujer murcielago
49.description: Batwoman is called to investigate a whacked out scientist that is capturing wrestlers and using their spinal fluid to create a Gill Man.

50.name: Blackbeard's Ghost
50.description: On the Carolina coast, Godolphin College's new track coach lodges at Blackbeard's Inn, run by the Daughters of the Buccaneers, who claim to be descendants of the notorious pirate, and who risk losing their hotel to the local mobster.
